thread.title: Trump closes out Black History Month with HBCUs order | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Trump closes out Black History Month with HBCUs order | Daily Mail Online

author: Francesca Chambers
title: Trump closes out Black History Month with HBCUs order | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad President Trump closes out Black History Month with an executive order making African-American colleges a 'priority again' after they got 'lost' in the Obama administration Trump will move the initiative to boost Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCUs) from the Department of Education to the White House Advocates of the program say it received insufficient attention in Barack Obama's administration at DOE The president and senior staff have participated in listening sessions with HBCU leaders in February - Trump invited many of them yesterday to the Oval
